Isn't it possible that the hypothetical "Theia" was responsible for a number of different catastrophes in our Solar System?  Perhaps "Theia" did all of the following things in one pass through the Solar System: 
1) knocked the Pluto-Charon system on its side, simultaneously making its orbit switch with Neptune's,
2) knocked Uranus on its side,
3) smashed into another planet whose remnants are now in the Asteroid Belt,
4) smashed into another proto-planet, which ultimately became Earth & our Moon, and Mars and its moons,
5) grazed off of Venus, which caused it to have a retrograde spin.
